Texts.Chs: 我发现了某种可以改善移动性的古老科技！
Texts.Eng: I've found some sort of ancient alien technology that appears to ^orange;significantly improve mobility^reset; passively while worn!

Texts.Chs: 通过使用这种科技，我的移动能力将会进入前所未有的层次！
Texts.Eng: Using alien technology I could create a ^orange;superior stim rig^reset; the likes of which nobody has ever seen!
